titleStmt.title: Certayne causes gathered together wherin is shewed the decaye of Engla[n]d, only by the great multitude of shepe, to the vtter decay of houshold keping, mayntenau[n]ce of men, dearth of corne, and other notable dyscommodityes approued by syxe olde prouerbes.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at London in Pouls churche yearde at the sygne of Saynct Austen by Heugh Syngelton,

notesStmt.note: Imprint taken from colophon; date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
